title: Why a Researcher Called XRP a ‚ÄúBiggest Scam‚Äù and Here‚Äôs How Ripple CTO Defended It?
body: After a constant downtrend for years, XRP gained bullish momentum in late 2024 and early 2025. However, since then, the Ripple token has been in turmoil. With that, many experts have been questioning the hype around this altcoin as its price performance and other metrics are questionable. One researcher even called it the biggest financial scam due to its low trading volume, but Ripple CTO bets differently. What‚Äôs happening? Let‚Äôs discuss. Researcher Claims XRP is the Biggest Scam Aylo, an alpha please researcher, has questioned the hype around the Ripple token , claiming that this is the biggest scam. In a recent X post, Aylo pointed out the XRPL‚Äôs decentralized exchange volume, arguing that it has only $44,000 in volume despite its high demand. With a snapshot from the DeFiLlama, he questions why such a top crypto with a high market capitalization has such a low volume. His remarks about the ‚Äòbiggest scam‚Äô on crypto, which was announced to be part of the U.S. Strategic Crypto Reserve , triggered discussion among the community. However, things got shorted as Ripple CTO David Schwartz came in support of the altcoin, along with a few other analysts presenting a different picture. Ripple CTO Discards Researcher‚Äôs XRP Allegation As the allegation led to a major discussion among the community, Ripple‚Äôs CTO corrected the researcher. With a comment on Aylo‚Äôs post, he clarified that the mentioned data represented only the Automated Market Makers (AMMs) on the XRPL. Notably, the AMMs account for just a minor portion of any network usage; Aylo‚Äôs allegation ended. David Schwartz also clarified that the suggested volume does not reflect the potential and utility of the Ripple token. I can‚Äôt find the exact page you‚Äôre looking at, but I bet that‚Äôs just looking at AMMs on XRPL, a miniscule fraction of what people use XRP for. Additionally, Vet, a dUNL validator, supports the Ripple CTO‚Äôs claims by presenting the correct volume figures. According to Vet‚Äôs stats, the actual 24-hour decentralized exchange volume on the XRPL is nearly $9M, which is not what the researcher claimed. More importantly, he called it the right opportunity for the market participants to leverage XRPL‚Äôs growth in the DeFi ecosystem. He claimed that a low DEX volume is the opportunity due to minimal participation. How is XRP Performing Today, and What‚Äôs Next? Despite the researcher‚Äôs scam allegation on the Ripple token, global investors still see it as a potential opportunity due to better updates from the SEC vs Ripple case, Donald Trump‚Äôs crypto reserve formation, and probable ETF launch this year. XRP currently trades at $2.40 with a market capitalization of $139.54B, making it the fourth biggest crypto after Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Tether. At present, its performance is significantly down amid the broader market correction. However, significant rallies with a shift in market sentiments are expected. The post Why a Researcher Called XRP a ‚ÄúBiggest Scam‚Äù and Here‚Äôs How Ripple CTO Defended It? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Crypto debanking is not over until Jan 2026: Caitlin Long
body: Update March 22, 2025, 10:08 a.m. UTC: This article has been updated to include an embed of the Chainreaction episode. The cryptocurrency industry may still be facing debanking-related issues in the United States, despite the recent wave of positive legislation, according to crypto regulatory experts and industry leaders. The collapse of crypto-friendly banks in early 2023 sparked the first allegations of Operation Chokepoint 2.0 . Critics, including venture capitalist Nic Carter, described it as a government effort to pressure banks into cutting ties with cryptocurrency firms. Despite numerous crypto-positive decisions from US President Donald Trump, including the March 7 order to use Bitcoin ( BTC ) seized in government criminal cases to establish a national reserve , the industry may still be facing banking issues. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs premature to say that debanking is over,‚Äù according to Caitlin Long, founder and CEO of Custodia Bank. Long said during Cointelegraph‚Äôs Chainreaction daily X show on March 21: ‚ÄúThere are two crypto-friendly banks under examination by the Fed right now and an army of examiners was sent into these banks, including the examiners from Washington, a literal army just smothering the banks.‚Äù The Crypto Debanking Crisis: #CHAINREACTION https://t.co/nD4qkkzKnB ‚Äî Cointelegraph (@Cointelegraph) March 21, 2025 ‚ÄúThe Fed is the outlier and the Fed is still controlled by democrats,‚Äù explained Long, adding: ‚ÄúTrump won‚Äôt have the ability to appoint a new Fed governor until January. So therefore you can see the breadcrumbs leading up to a potentially big fight. Because if the OCC and FDIC overturn their anti-crypto guidance but the Fed does not, where does that leave us?‚Äù Long‚Äôs Custodia Bank was repeatedly targeted by the US debanking efforts, which cost the firm months of work and ‚Äúa couple of million dollars,‚Äù she explained. Industry outrage over alleged debanking reached a crescendo when a June 2024 lawsuit spearheaded by ‚Äã‚ÄãCoinbase resulted in the release of letters showing US banking regulators asked certain financial institutions to ‚Äúpause‚Äù crypto banking activities. Related: FDIC chair, ‚Äòarchitect of Operation Chokepoint 2.0‚Äô Martin Gruenberg to resign Jan. 19 Crypto debanking is the biggest operational problem in EU: blockchain regulations adviser Cryptocurrency debanking is also among the biggest challenges for European cryptocurrency firms, according to Anastasija Plotnikova, co-founder and CEO of blockchain regulatory firm Fideum. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre living in 2025 and debanking is still one of the main operational issues for both small and large crypto firms,‚Äù said Plotnikova, adding: ‚ÄúCrypto debanking is also a problem here in the EU. I had my accounts closed in 2017, 2018, 2019, 2021, and 2022, but 2024 was a good year. Operationally these problems exist for both users and crypto firms operating.‚Äù Related: Paolo Ardoino: Competitors and politicians intend to ‚Äòkill Tether‚Äô The comments come two weeks after the US Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) eased its stance on how banks can engage with crypto just hours after US President Donald Trump vowed to end the prolonged crackdown restricting crypto firms‚Äô access to banking services. Trump‚Äôs remarks were made during the White House Crypto Summit , where he told industry leaders he was ‚Äúending Operation Chokepoint 2.0.‚Äù Source: Elon Musk At least 30 tech and crypto founders were ‚Äúsecretly debanked‚Äù in the US during Operation Chokepoint 2.0, Cointelegraph reported in November 2024. Magazine: SEC‚Äôs U-turn on crypto leaves key questions unanswered

title: Pi Network‚Äôs PI Finally Rebounds, Bitcoin (BTC) Calm at $84K (Weekend Watch)
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs price consolidation around the $84,000 level continues as the asset has failed to breakout in either direction over the past week or so, despite a few attempts. Most altcoins sit quietly today, with little to no gains. PI has popped up by 9% after a recent landslide, while HYPE has surged by double digits. BTC Calm at $84K Last weekend went relatively quietly as BTC was stuck around the same level as now. The only exception came on Sunday evening after a whale opened a large short position, and BTC went up and down by about a grand. The beginning of the business week was also quieter, aside from a price slump toward $81,000 on Tuesday. However, BTC bounced off and jumped to $83,000 ahead of the second FOMC meeting for the year. Once that concluded on Wednesday and the Fed refused to change the key interest rates, BTC experienced some more volatility around $83,000 and $85,000. It went on the offensive later and spiked above $87,000 during the early morning Asian trading session. However, that was short-lived, and the asset slumped to $83,000 a day later. It has returned to $84,000 since then as it prepares for another calm weekend. Its market cap has risen to $1.670 trillion on CG, while its dominance over the alts has declined to 58.3%. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView PI Rebounds Pi Network‚Äôs native token is among the poorest performers on a weekly scale, having dumped by over 30%. However, it finally saw some relief in the past 24 hours, as its price has returned to $1 after an 8-9% surge. HYPE is the other notable gainer since yesterday, having jumped by 14-5%. It now trades above $16. In contrast, XRP, BNB, ADA, LEO, TON, and XLM are slightly in the red, while ETH, SOL, DOGE, and TRX have marked minor gains. The total crypto market cap failed to overcome the $2.9 trillion mark and now sits about $30 billion below it on CG. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Pi Network‚Äôs PI Finally Rebounds, Bitcoin (BTC) Calm at $84K (Weekend Watch) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Elon Musk‚Äôs Twitter/X to retire final chunk of buyout debt held by Wall Street
body: Elon Musk‚Äôs social media platform X (formerly Twitter) is planning to repurchase the final $1.2 billion chunk of high-risk debt left over from the $44 billion Twitter buyout in 2022. This piece is known as second-lien debt, and it‚Äôs been sitting like dead weight on the books of seven major banks, led by Morgan Stanley, for almost three years. This last batch is the riskiest of the lot and has been the hardest to get rid of. The buyback might be funded using proceeds from a recent equity raise, according to a report from Bloomberg. They also said nothing‚Äôs locked in yet. The move, if finalized, would let banks finally dump the worst part of the $13 billion loan package that backed Elon‚Äôs takeover. Most of the other debt tied to the deal was already sold off earlier this year. The second-lien piece was the one nobody wanted. Banks unload risky leftovers as X pushes ahead Back when the buyout happened, banks expected to flip the loans quickly. Instead, they hit a wall. The value of X sank fast, and there were no buyers. The banks got stuck holding paper that nobody wanted and had to cut valuations by nearly half. But now the mood has shifted. One reason: Elon‚Äôs tight connection with President Donald Trump. That new proximity to the White House is changing how investors look at X‚Äôs debt. As one source put it, ‚ÄúIt took one election and a billionaire bromance to flip the script.‚Äù Morgan Stanley is now leading the charge to pitch a new $3 billion offering of X debt. They‚Äôre telling investors that X is stabilizing. Buyers who‚Äôve seen X‚Äôs financials say the numbers look better. X posted $400 million in Ebitda on $710 million revenue in Q4 2024. That‚Äôs higher than the two previous quarters. Morgan Stanley says X is on track for about $1.2 billion in adjusted Ebitda this year. Those improvements are making it easier for banks to sell what‚Äôs left. Loans that were once worth 60 cents on the dollar are now being offered at 95 cents or more, according to Bloomberg. Still, not everything looks pretty. X‚Äôs revenue is down nearly 50% since the original buyout. But major cost cuts by Elon have kept the business running. X‚Äôs earnings are flat compared to 2022, but those numbers are padded with a bunch of adjustments to make things look better. One investor said, ‚ÄúIf they thought they had lost 40% of their principal and now get out at something close to break even, that‚Äôs a nice turnaround.‚Äù Investors dig into X‚Äôs shady financials Some investors are raising red flags about how X reports money coming in from ‚Äúrelated parties‚Äù that aren‚Äôt part of the main platform. Restructuring costs are also being removed from the numbers. That includes layoffs ‚Äî a huge chunk of the workforce got axed after Elon took over. The company now has just $400 million in cash. That‚Äôs a steep drop from the $1.4 billion it had in 2022. Even with all that, the interest in X debt keeps growing. The recent $1 billion sale that closed at 90‚Äì95 cents per dollar sparked a flood of inquiries. It‚Äôs not just the business. It‚Äôs the Musk factor. One source said, ‚ÄúThere seems to be no shortage of investors wanting a chance to own a piece of X, and therefore the Musk empire.‚Äù The banks that backed the deal, despite the headaches, have made real money. Bloomberg says they earned about $3 billion in interest since 2022. That‚Äôs more than enough to wipe out any paper losses. Still, the longer they hold the debt, the more it gums up their balance sheets. That‚Äôs why they want out now, while the market is hot. Elon‚Äôs AI play sweetens the deal for buyers A big reason for renewed interest is X‚Äôs $6 billion stake in xAI, Elon‚Äôs artificial intelligence venture. Morgan Stanley is using that as a carrot in its sales pitch. If X goes south, buyers might have a claim on xAI. Investors like the optional upside. The current $3 billion offering matures in 2029 and pays 6.5% above the Secured Overnight Financing Rate (SOFR). That adds up to a fat 12% yield. High return, high risk. X still doesn‚Äôt have a credit rating. Its leverage ratio is around 10 times earnings. That scares off some buyers, but the yield is pulling others in. Banks know this round won‚Äôt be the end. They‚Äôve still got other unsecured chunks on their books. Those are way riskier and could be nearly impossible to sell close to face value. But this round ‚Äî the one backed by xAI and improved numbers ‚Äî is the safest part left. This whole Twitter-turned-X saga is unlike anything Wall Street normally deals with. The fact that it might end with profits for the banks is wild. Robert Willens, a tax expert, said, ‚ÄúThey have certainly recovered more than 100 cents on the dollar.‚Äù Still, a lot of this is based on hype. Nobody knows how stable X really is. The platform‚Äôs revenue is still way down. Layoffs gutted the team. The cash pile is shrinking. But as long as the numbers can be adjusted just right, and as long as Elon keeps that White House connection, there‚Äôs a crowd ready to take the risk. And Wall Street? They‚Äôre finally seeing a way out of the mess. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Cosmos price prediction 2025-2031: Will ATOM recover ATH?
body: Key takeaways : Cosmos‚Äôs price is predicted to reach a maximum value of $6.80 in 2025. In 2028, the coin could be worth between $18.49 and $21.97, with an average price of $19.01. By 2031, Cosmos (ATOM) might touch $67.56. Cosmos (ATOM) is a blockchain ecosystem that facilitates interoperability among independent blockchains. Co-founded by Jae Kwon and Ethan Buchman in 2014, Cosmos aims to create a decentralized network of blockchains that can communicate and transact seamlessly. Its main components include the Cosmos Hub, which serves as the central chain, and multiple ‚Äúzones‚Äù that operate under their own rules while connecting to the Hub. The platform uses the Tendermint consensus algorithm and Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) protocol to enable fast low-cost transactions. Fees average around $0.01, and confirmation times are approximately seven seconds. Cosmos employs a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mechanism, allowing users to stake their ATOM tokens for network security and transaction validation. Since its ICO in 2017, Cosmos has raised significant funding and established a growing ecosystem, including notable projects like Terra and Binance. With over 286 million ATOM tokens in circulation and a market cap exceeding $7.7 billion, Cosmos is positioned as a key player in the evolving landscape of blockchain technology, often referred to as the ‚ÄúInternet of Blockchains‚Äù for its ambitious goal of connecting diverse blockchain networks. Cosmos historic price sentiment Cosmos price history Cosmos, created by Ethan Buchman and Jae Kwon, launched its Initial Coin Offering (ICO) in 2017, with the network officially going live two years later in 2019. During the bullish market cycle of 2021, Cosmos saw its price peak at over $44, driven by significant investor interest and market optimism. However, following this surge, on 3rd April 2022, the price of Cosmos (ATOM) sharply declined to $6.39. Since then, Cosmos entered a prolonged phase of consolidation, trading within a range between $6.39 and $16 as market dynamics fluctuated. In early 2024, particularly around 8th March, Cosmos encountered significant resistance at the $13 level, struggling to gain momentum above this point. By July 2024, ATOM‚Äôs price was trading in a narrower range, between $5 and $6, indicating a lack of upward momentum. On September 2024, the Cosmos price ranged between $4 to $5, and on October 06, the price traded at $4.5837 with a trading volume of $48.48M. On November 5, ATOM was trading at $4.10. By December 5, ATOM‚Äôs price surged significantly, trading at $10. Cosmos ATOM surged to $9 at the start of December 2024, but it declined to $9.6 and closed the year at $6.3. In January 2025, Cosmos peaked at $7.77, and in February, it‚Äôs trading between $4.54 and $4.86. ATOM value decreased further in March as it dipped to the $4.0 to $4.2 range.

title: Alarming $18.6M Ethereum ETF Outflows: Spot ETH Funds See Concerning 13-Day Streak
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The U.S. spot Ethereum ETF market is experiencing some turbulence. Recent data reveals a notable trend that‚Äôs got investors and analysts alike scratching their heads. For thirteen consecutive trading days, we‚Äôve witnessed net outflows from these highly anticipated investment vehicles. Let‚Äôs dive into the details and explore what this could mean for the future of Spot Ethereum ETF s and the broader crypto landscape. What‚Äôs Happening with Ethereum ETF Outflows? On March 21st, U.S. spot Ethereum ETF s collectively saw a net outflow of $18.6 million. This marks the 13th day in a row where more money has been pulled out of these ETFs than invested. This consistent outflow raises questions about investor sentiment and the short-term trajectory of these investment products. While daily fluctuations are normal in the volatile crypto market, a persistent trend like this warrants closer examination. Let‚Äôs break down the key players and their contributions to this outflow: BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA: Leading the pack in outflows was BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Ethereum Trust (ETHA), experiencing a net outflow of $11.9 million. As one of the largest asset managers globally, BlackRock‚Äôs ETF movements are closely watched, and this outflow is particularly noteworthy. Grayscale‚Äôs ETH: Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Trust (ETH) followed closely with a net outflow of $6.7 million. Grayscale, a pioneer in crypto investment products, has been navigating the transition of its existing trust into a spot ETF, and these outflows may reflect investor adjustments during this period. Other ETFs: The remaining spot Ethereum ETFs reported minimal net activity on March 21st, indicating that the outflows were primarily concentrated in BlackRock‚Äôs and Grayscale‚Äôs funds. ETF Provider ETF Ticker Net Outflow (USD) BlackRock ETHA $11.9 Million Grayscale ETH $6.7 Million Other ETFs ‚Äì Minimal/Neutral Total Net Outflow $18.6 Million Why are we seeing these outflows from Spot Ethereum ETFs? Several factors could be contributing to the recent Crypto ETF outflow trend. Understanding these potential drivers is crucial for investors trying to navigate the current market. Let‚Äôs explore some possibilities: Profit Taking: After the initial hype and inflows following the launch of spot Ethereum ETFs, some investors may be taking profits. The crypto market has seen significant gains recently, and ETF holders might be rebalancing their portfolios or securing returns. Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. Periods of uncertainty or price corrections can trigger investors to reduce risk and move assets out of ETFs, especially those who are more risk-averse or trading on shorter timeframes. Macroeconomic Factors: Broader economic conditions, such as interest rate hikes or inflation concerns, can influence investor sentiment across all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies and related ETFs. Uncertainty in the global economy can lead to a general risk-off approach. Alternative Investment Opportunities: The crypto space is constantly evolving. New investment opportunities might be emerging that are drawing capital away from existing ETH ETF products. Investors may be shifting funds to DeFi projects, new token launches, or other areas within the digital asset ecosystem. Grayscale ETF Restructuring: As Grayscale converts its existing Ethereum Trust into a spot ETF, some investors who initially held shares in the trust might be re-evaluating their positions or seeking alternative ETF options. This transition period can sometimes lead to temporary outflows. Are Ethereum ETF Outflows a cause for concern? While 13 consecutive days of net outflows might sound alarming, it‚Äôs important to maintain perspective. Here‚Äôs a balanced view to consider: Early Stages: Spot Ethereum ETF s are still relatively new investment products. Market dynamics and investor behavior are likely to be more volatile in the initial phases as the market matures and finds its equilibrium. Broader Market Context: It‚Äôs essential to analyze these outflows in the context of the overall cryptocurrency market. Are we seeing outflows across the board, or is this specific to Ethereum ETFs? Examining broader market trends provides a more comprehensive picture. Long-Term Perspective: Investing in ETFs, particularly in emerging asset classes like crypto, is often a long-term strategy. Short-term fluctuations and outflows are not necessarily indicative of the long-term viability or success of these products. Focus on the underlying fundamentals and adoption of Ethereum and the broader crypto ecosystem. Outflow Volume: While the streak is notable, the daily outflow amounts are relatively small compared to the overall assets under management in the spot Crypto ETF market. It‚Äôs important to consider the magnitude of the outflows in relation to the total market size. What does this mean for the future of Ethereum ETFs? The recent Ethereum ETF Outflows present a mixed bag of signals. While the consecutive days of outflows are noteworthy, they don‚Äôt necessarily signal a long-term downturn for these investment products. Here‚Äôs what we can infer and consider moving forward: Market Correction or Consolidation: The outflows could simply be a sign of a healthy market correction or consolidation after a period of rapid growth and initial enthusiasm. This is a natural part of market cycles and not necessarily a negative indicator. Investor Sentiment Shift: It‚Äôs crucial to monitor if this outflow trend persists. A prolonged period of outflows could indicate a shift in investor sentiment towards Ethereum ETFs, potentially driven by factors mentioned earlier like macroeconomic conditions or alternative investment opportunities. Opportunity for Strategic Entry: For long-term investors who believe in the future of Ethereum and crypto, these outflows and potential price dips could present strategic entry points. ‚ÄúBuy the dip‚Äù is a common mantra in crypto investing, and periods of market correction can offer opportunities to accumulate assets at potentially lower prices. Importance of Diversification: The recent outflows underscore the importance of diversification in investment portfolios. Relying solely on one asset class or investment product can expose investors to concentrated risk. Diversifying across different asset classes and within the crypto space itself can help mitigate volatility and manage risk. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should crypto investors take away from these ETH ETF outflow trends? Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on ETF flow data and broader market indicators. Utilize resources like Farside Investors and other reputable data providers to stay updated on market movements. Do Your Research: Understand the underlying factors driving market trends. Don‚Äôt react impulsively to short-term fluctuations. Conduct thorough research on the assets you invest in and the macroeconomic environment. Consider Long-Term Goals: Align your investment strategy with your long-term financial goals. Are you a long-term holder or a short-term trader? Your investment horizon should guide your decisions during periods of market volatility. Manage Risk: Implement robust risk management strategies. Diversification, position sizing, and stop-loss orders are essential tools for managing risk in the volatile crypto market. Seek Professional Advice: If you‚Äôre unsure how to navigate these market dynamics, consider seeking advice from a qualified financial advisor who understands the cryptocurrency market. Conclusion: Navigating the Ethereum ETF Landscape The $18.6 million net outflow from U.S. spot Ethereum ETF s on March 21st, extending a 13-day outflow streak, is a development worth noting. While it might raise eyebrows, it‚Äôs crucial to analyze this within the broader context of the nascent Spot Ethereum ETF market and the inherent volatility of the cryptocurrency space. These outflows could be driven by various factors, from profit-taking and market corrections to macroeconomic influences and evolving investment preferences. For investors, the key takeaway is to stay informed, maintain a long-term perspective, and manage risk effectively. The Ethereum ETF market is still in its early innings, and its long-term trajectory will depend on a multitude of factors, including continued adoption of Ethereum, regulatory developments, and overall market sentiment. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Shiba Inu Price Prediction: Analysts Expect 81% Surge Amid Whale Activity
body: The post Shiba Inu Price Prediction: Analysts Expect 81% Surge Amid Whale Activity appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Shiba Inu (SHIB), which started as a meme coin, has now become one of the most popular cryptocurrencies among investors. Right now, SHIB is trading at $0.0000127, holding strong above $0.0000125. Despite facing some price drops analysts predict a massive breakout could push its price up by 81% due to rising whale activity and an increasing burn rate. Shiba Inu Ready for an 81% Surge Looking at SHIB‚Äôs 1-day chart, it is forming a falling wedge pattern, which is generally seen as a bullish reversal signal. Since December 2024, SHIB has been trading within this downward-sloping wedge, consistently making lower highs and lower lows. However, the price is now testing a breakout level around $0.0000129, suggesting a potential trend reversal. If SHIB successfully breaks out of this pattern, it could trigger a massive rally, targeting an 81.63% increase, bringing the price up to around $0.000023. Aligning with the bullish outlook, crypto analyst CryptoELITES anticipates a short-term price surge for SHIB and predicts a massive 17x rally. Why Not a 17 X for SHIB? The real battle lies at the $0.000014 resistance, where 236 billion SHIB tokens are waiting. If bulls manage to break past this level, the next major hurdle is between $0.000014 and $0.000019, where a staggering 548 trillion SHIB tokens have been accumulated. On the flip side, if SHIB fails to hold $0.0000125, a drop to $0.0000115 is likely. So far, the token has struggled to maintain its bullish momentum, facing repeated rejections at the $0.000014 level. Whales and Burn Rate Show Positive Signs Big players are showing interest in SHIB again, with whale activity spiking in recent days. A massive 7.49 trillion SHIB was moved in large transactions, marking the highest volume seen in two months. At the same time, the SHIB burn rate has jumped by 2227% in the last 24 hours, removing over $18.6 million worth of tokens from circulation. The total SHIB burned has now reached 410.7 trillion, reducing the available supply to around 589 trillion tokens. title: Dogecoin Breaks Under Ascending Triangle: 16% Crash Incoming?
body: An analyst has pointed out how Dogecoin could end up seeing an extended drawdown, based on this Ascending Triangle pattern forming in its hourly price. Dogecoin Has Lost The Support Of An Ascending Triangle Recently In a new post on X, analyst Ali Martinez has talked about an Ascending Triangle pattern for Dogecoin. The ‚ÄúAscending Triangle‚Äù refers to a technical analysis (TA) formation that appears when the price of an asset consolidates inside a triangular region. The ‚ÄòAscending‚Äô in the pattern‚Äôs name comes from the fact that this consolidation happens towards a net upside. There are two trendlines in this pattern: an upper level that‚Äôs parallel to the time-axis, tracing successive highs, and a lower one that has a positive slope, connecting successive higher lows. Related Reading: This Bitcoin Correction Is Different From March 2024‚ÄîHere‚Äôs Why Just like with any other consolidation pattern in TA, the upper level of the triangle is likely to be a source of resistance in the near future, while the lower one that of support. A break out of either of these boundaries can signal a continuation of trend in that direction. The Ascending Triangle isn‚Äôt the only type of triangular pattern in TA, two other popular varieties include the Descending Triangle and Symmetrical Triangle. The former of these is just the opposite of the Ascending Triangle: it forms when the price consolidates to the downside instead. The latter, the Symmetrical Triangle, is a sort of middle-ground between the Ascending and Descending versions, with both of its trendlines having an equal and opposite slope. That is, when the asset is inside this pattern, it converges at a mid-point. Recently, Dogecoin‚Äôs 1-hour price looked like it was following an Ascending Triangle. Here is the chart shared by Martinez, that shows this pattern for the memecoin: As is visible in the above graph, the hourly Dogecoin price recently made a retest of the lower line of this Ascending Triangle, but it would appear the coin has been unsuccessful in finding support at it, as it has slipped right through. Related Reading: XRP Jumps 7% After Surge In Network Activity & Whale Buying From the graph, it‚Äôs apparent that the memecoin wasn‚Äôt far from the apex of the triangle when this break came. Consolidation gets narrower as an asset reaches the end of the pattern, so breakouts start to become more likely. As mentioned before, a breakout can mean a potential continuation of trend in the direction of the break. So, in this case, DOGE has just witnessed a bearish signal. Often, the length of a move emerging out of an Ascending Triangle breakout is of the same length as the height of the triangle itself. Based on this, the analyst notes a 16% price swing could occur for the coin as a result of pattern. DOGE Price Dogecoin has taken to flat movement in the past week as its price is still floating around the $0.16 mark. Featured image from Dall-E, charts from TradingView.com

Pendle historic price sentiment PENDLE price history In September 2020, the price of Pendle started at around $1.0849, and a gradual decline followed. Between October and December 2020, the price decreased steadily, ending the year below $1.0. Between January and June 2021, the price remained relatively stable, fluctuating around the $0.90 to $1.0 range. Between July and December 2021, Pendle continued to exhibit minor fluctuations, maintaining a range around the $1.0 mark but showing no significant upward or downward trend. The price of Pendle from January to December 2022 remained relatively flat, hovering around the $1.0849 mark with minimal fluctuations. There was little to no significant upward or downward movement during this period. In June 2023, the price remained stable, with slight declines observed but staying well below the $1.0 mark. Pendle price movements showed no significant upward momentum and maintained a steady range. title: South Korea‚Äôs crypto investor base surges over 50% last year
body: A survey carried out on March 21st across five South Korean crypto exchanges revealed that the number of domestic crypto investors increased by over 50% last year. The amount of crypto owned by South Korean investors is currently worth over 105T won. According to reports from local media outlet Donga , data received by Democratic Party lawmaker Ahn Do-Jae from five domestic crypto exchanges, including Upbit, Bithumb, Coinone, Korbit, and Gopax, on the 21st, showed there were 9,667,023 investors who had trading accounts on these exchanges at the end of last year (Korbit as of the end of September 2024). The number of South Korea‚Äôs crypto investors increased by 52.6% (3,333,439 people), bringing the total value of crypto owned to over 105T won. The number of crypto investors in their 50s and 60s increased significantly, reaching 1.75M at the end of last year, up 56.4% YoY. The number of crypto investors over 60 also increased sharply, from 371.8K in the same period to 636.7K, up 52.6%. Number of South Korean crypto investors surges over 50% in 2024 South Korea's crypto investor count jumped over 50%, hitting 9.66 million. Surprisingly, 1 in 4 is over 50, and half of the high-net-worth investors with over 1B KRW are in the same age group. What's driving this shift? Dive in: https://t.co/PhQQyHGYFC > #Crypto #Investing ‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Satoshi Club Alerts (@satoshi_alerts) March 22, 2025 The number of cryptocurrency investors in South Korea surged by more than 50% last year, reaching 9.66 million. Notably, one in every four cryptocurrency investors and about half of the high-net-worth investors holding more than 1 billion KRW in cryptocurrency are aged 50 or above. Among the 9,135 investors who owned crypto worth more than 1 billion won in five exchanges at the end of last year, 35.2% (3,215) were in their 50s, and 19.9% (1,817) were over 60 years old. The average big investor over 50 years of age owned 2.15 billion won worth of crypto. Jess Zeng, mETH protocol ecosystem lead, also noted that South Korea was among Asian countries joining the growing list of countries opening up to institutional crypto investments. She added that increasing institutional capital flows into crypto accelerated the adoption of assets like ETH, with Mantle and mETHProtocol playing key roles in this shift. ‚ÄúIn order to protect investors, a minimum regulatory basis should be established as soon as possible.‚Äù ~ Councilman Ahn Do-Jae Rep. Ahn stressed the need to establish a minimum regulatory framework promptly‚Äô, citing the growing number of older investors and the associated need for investor protection. Rep. Lim Kwang-hyun also pointed out that ‚Äòat a pan-governmental level‚Äô, South Korea needed to take thorough measures to enhance the stability of the crypto market and establish sound trading practices that protect investors‚Äô rights. Bank of Korea (BOK) released first crypto investor data in December 2024 The Bank of Korea‚Äôs data, shared by Rep. Lim Kwang-hyun of the Democratic Party of Korea, revealed that the number of cryptocurrency investors in South Korea surged to 15.59 million (approximately 30% of the country‚Äôs population) as of November, a rise of 610K from the previous month. Additionally, the total market value of crypto held by Korean investors as of the 25th of December 2024 reached 102.6 trillion won. The data also showed a significant increase in crypto transactions, which rivaled domestic stock market volumes. In November, the daily domestic crypto transaction volume averaged 14.9 trillion won (roughly $10.2 billion), nearly equaling the combined volume of the KOSPI at 9.9 trillion won and the Kosdaq at 6.9 trillion won. As of December 25th, the total market value of crypto held by Korean investors increased by 76.9% from the previous month. Additionally, funds waiting to be invested, or deposits, totaled 8.8 trillion won during the same period. Data compiled by South Korean regulators also showed that the number of crypto investors in the country increased by 21% year-on-year in the first half of 2024 to 7.78 million, which was about 15% of the South Korea population of 52 million. The average daily trading volume of crypto jumped 67% to 6 trillion won during the same period, while the market value of crypto in South Korea rose 27% to 55.3 trillion won. title: John Reed Stark Slams Crypto at SEC Roundtable, Rejects Regulatory Reform
body: Former SEC enforcement director John Reed Stark took a hardline stance against regulatory reform for cryptocurrencies during the first-ever SEC crypto roundtable. Stark, a vocal critic of the digital asset industry, argued that the Securities Act of 1933 and 1934 should remain unchanged, firmly stating that crypto should not be given special treatment under U.S. securities laws. Speaking at the event, Stark dismissed the notion that digital assets should be classified differently from traditional securities. ‚ÄúThe people buying crypto are not collectors. We all know that they are investors, and the mission of the SEC is to protect investors,‚Äù he asserted. Stark emphasized that crypto firms have repeatedly fought regulatory oversight but have consistently failed in court. ‚ÄúThe volume of case law has developed so quickly because of all these crypto firms. They went for this delay, delay, delay tactic, hiring top law firms to challenge the SEC,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve read every single one of their briefs, and they lost nearly every time.‚Äù No Innovation in Crypto: Former SEC Regulator Starkdismissed claims that cryptocurrencies represent groundbreaking innovation. He compared the rise of digital assets to previous technological revolutions, such as the launch of the iPhone, but concluded that crypto offers no comparable progress. ‚ÄúI see no innovation here. Nothing in crypto comes close to the technological leap of the iPhone or the early internet,‚Äù he remarked. Stark argued that the industry instead thrives on legal maneuvering and delaying tactics, rather than delivering genuine technological advancement. His comments reflect a broader skepticism toward crypto‚Äôs value proposition, as he continues to label the sector as rife with opacity and deception. Critic Faces Industry Backlash Stark‚Äôs anti-crypto rhetoric is nothing new . In February 2024, he likened a sponsorship deal between the Dallas Mavericks and crypto firm Voyager to a partnership with a ‚Äúheroin manufacturing firm.‚Äù His hardline stance has drawn sharp criticism from industry figures. In June 2023, billionaire investor Mark Cuban dismissed Stark‚Äôs repeated crypto bashing as ‚Äúcrypto derangement syndrome.‚Äù Despite the backlash, Stark remains adamant that the SEC‚Äôs regulation-by-enforcement approach under Chairman Gary Gensler is justified, arguing that the crypto industry must comply with existing laws rather than pushing for new, lenient regulations . The post John Reed Stark Slams Crypto at SEC Roundtable, Rejects Regulatory Reform appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Volatile Market Sentiment: Could Bitcoin Reclaim $90K in the Coming Days?
body: Bitcoin is trading near $84,230, up 0.23% on Saturday, as traders weigh policy developments and technical signals that could set the tone for the next move. With momentum building, market watchers are asking: is $90,000 within reach? U.S. Considers Bitcoin Reserve Using Gold Profits In a notable policy shift, the Trump administration is evaluating a proposal to fund Bitcoin purchases using unrealized gains from gold certificates. The plan would not rely on taxpayer dollars. Instead, it would revalue gold certificates‚Äîcurrently marked at $42.22 per ounce‚Äîto reflect the current market price of around $3,000. This adjustment could unlock billions in funds for a potential ‚ÄúStrategic Bitcoin Reserve.‚Äù The U.S. is suggesting it may sell its gold reserves to buy more Bitcoin "If we actually realize the gains on gold, that would be a budget-neutral way to acquire more Bitcoin." ‚Äì Bo Hines in referencing the Bitcoin Act of 2025 pic.twitter.com/QSm4d0471r ‚Äî Coin Bureau (@coinbureau) March 21, 2025 Bo Hines of the White House Crypto Council cited the BITCOIN Act of 2025, introduced by Senator Cynthia Lummis, as a framework for this initiative. If implemented, it would mark the first time the U.S. government formally allocates a portion of its balance sheet to Bitcoin. Institutional confidence in BTC could rise sharply in response, potentially lifting prices in the coming weeks. SEC‚Äôs Crypto Roundtable Signals Softer Stance; Bitcoin May Benefit The SEC‚Äôs first-ever crypto regulation roundtable brought optimism to markets. The session focused on balancing innovation with investor protection and included a key clarification: cryptocurrency mining does not constitute a securities offering. This could ease some long-standing concerns among U.S. miners and institutional investors. The SEC‚Äôs first Crypto Task Force roundtable marks a shift toward collaborative rulemaking, addressing digital asset classification and future regulations. Find out how this impacts cryptocurrency investors and exchanges. https://t.co/Xpn8bZYODs pic.twitter.com/gWps3tpBFG ‚Äî DNIR Flash News **Original:* (@cnir_bayarea) March 22, 2025 President Trump also reaffirmed his pro-crypto stance, calling for the U.S. to become a global crypto leader. If regulatory clarity improves, Bitcoin may benefit from renewed institutional flows. Lawmakers Pressure SEC on Meme Coins; Supporting Bitcoin Political scrutiny is building around meme coin regulation. Senators including Elizabeth Warren criticized the SEC‚Äôs exemption of tokens linked to public figures, including Melania and Donald Trump. Lawmakers argue that this lack of oversight exposes retail investors to scams while giving preferential treatment to politically-affiliated projects. Two U.S. lawmakers just went after the SEC with serious heat Sen. Warren and Rep. Auchincloss are demanding answers after the agency said meme coins aren‚Äôt securities‚Äîright after President Trump and First Lady Melania launched TRUMP and MELANIA tokens They're calling out‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Bitcoin.com News (@BTCTN) March 21, 2025 This renewed debate could reinforce Bitcoin‚Äôs appeal as a more secure, transparent digital asset. If meme coins come under regulatory fire, capital may rotate into BTC as the dominant ‚Äúsafe-haven‚Äù crypto. Switzerland Says No, U.S. Moves Forward While the U.S. eyes Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset, the Swiss National Bank (SNB) is taking the opposite view. The SNB cited legal and technical risks as reasons to reject adding BTC to its reserves. Vice President Martin Schlegel reaffirmed that their current reserve structure serves monetary stability better than crypto assets. The Swiss National Bank won‚Äôt buy Bitcoin and similar digital currencies, even after President Donald Trump made a push to establish a strategic US reserve, central bank chief Martin Schlegel said https://t.co/cAUDqL7cLW pic.twitter.com/sbk4bLzCjd ‚Äî Bloomberg (@business) March 20, 2025 However, the U.S. pivot is more influential globally and could outweigh Switzerland‚Äôs caution, reinforcing Bitcoin‚Äôs growing institutional legitimacy. Bitcoin Technical Analysis: Reclaiming $90K? Bitcoin is consolidating around $84,360 on the 4-hour chart, forming a symmetrical triangle‚Äîa pattern that often precedes major moves. Price is holding above an ascending trendline and the 50-day EMA, currently near $84,030. Immediate resistance lies at $84,340, with breakouts targeting $87,410 and $89,900. If BTC fails to hold support, it could drop to $81,550. Volume remains steady, but directionless. A strong breakout above $84,340 could be the catalyst needed to make $90,000 a near-term reality. Key Takeaways: Bitcoin eyes $87,410 and $89,900 if $84,340 breaks. The 50-day EMA at $84,030 offers critical support. U.S. policy momentum may provide fuel for another leg up. Available on Google Play and the App Store, it offers real-time investment insights and seamless staking, making it a go-to choice for crypto users. title: Secure MET Token Distribution: Meteora‚Äôs Blacklist Enhances Crypto Fairness on Solana DEX
body: In the ever-evolving world of decentralized finance (DeFi), ensuring fairness and security is paramount. Meteora, a prominent decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the Solana blockchain, is taking a bold step in this direction. Responding to growing Web3 community trust concerns, Meteora has announced the implementation of a blacklist system. This strategic move aims to safeguard the integrity of its MET token distribution and foster a more equitable environment for all participants. Let‚Äôs dive into the details of this exciting development and explore what it means for the future of DeFi on Solana. Why a Blacklist for MET Token Distribution? Addressing Crypto Fairness Concerns The core of Meteora‚Äôs decision to introduce a blacklist stems from a fundamental question within the crypto space: How do we ensure crypto fairness in token distribution? In decentralized ecosystems, where anonymity and pseudonymity are common, the potential for malicious actors to exploit systems is a persistent challenge. The community voiced legitimate concerns about the possibility of MET tokens falling into the hands of individuals or entities intending to manipulate the system or act against the community‚Äôs best interests. Meteora listened, and acted decisively. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the key reasons behind this crucial decision: Preventing Abuse of LP Stimulus Plan: Liquidity Provider (LP) stimulus plans are designed to incentivize users to contribute liquidity to DEXs, fostering a healthy trading environment. However, these plans can be vulnerable to abuse. Malicious actors might attempt to game the system, accumulating tokens unfairly and undermining the intended benefits for genuine community members. Maintaining Decentralized Exchange Security: A fair token distribution is intrinsically linked to the overall security and health of a decentralized exchange security . When tokens are concentrated in the hands of bad actors, it can lead to governance vulnerabilities, market manipulation, and ultimately, a loss of trust in the platform. Upholding Community Values: The ethos of Web3 and DeFi is built upon principles of transparency, fairness, and community governance. Introducing a blacklist is a proactive measure to uphold these values, demonstrating Meteora‚Äôs commitment to its community and fostering a trustworthy ecosystem. Meteora‚Äôs proactive approach underscores the importance of community feedback in shaping the future of DeFi projects. By directly addressing concerns about fairness, Meteora is setting a new standard for responsible token distribution. How Will the Solana DEX Blacklist Work? Transparency and Community Input Transparency is key to the effectiveness and acceptance of any blacklist system. Meteora understands this, and is committed to making the Solana DEX blacklist process open and accessible. Here‚Äôs how it will function: Publicly Accessible Blacklist: The blacklist itself will be publicly available for anyone to view. This transparency ensures accountability and allows the community to monitor its effectiveness. Community-Driven Submissions: Anyone can submit wallet addresses they suspect of abusing the LP Stimulus Plan. This empowers the community to actively participate in maintaining the integrity of the MET token distribution. Supported by Reputable Tools: Meteora is leveraging the expertise of Bubblemaps and Rugcheck, well-known platforms for on-chain analysis and risk assessment. This collaboration adds a layer of credibility and rigor to the blacklist process. Due Diligence and Review: While community submissions are welcomed, it‚Äôs crucial to understand that there will be a process of due diligence and review before any wallet address is added to the blacklist. This prevents arbitrary blacklisting and ensures fair consideration of each case. This community-driven, transparent approach is a significant step forward in fostering trust and accountability within the DeFi space. By making the blacklist public and encouraging community participation, Meteora is building a more resilient and equitable ecosystem. Benefits of the Meteora Blacklist: A Win-Win for the Ecosystem The introduction of a blacklist for MET token distribution is not merely a reactive measure; it‚Äôs a proactive strategy that offers numerous benefits to the Meteora ecosystem and its users. Let‚Äôs explore some of the key advantages: Benefit Description Enhanced Fairness Ensures that MET tokens are distributed more equitably, rewarding genuine community members and contributors rather than malicious actors. Increased Security Reduces the risk of token concentration in the hands of bad actors, strengthening the overall security and governance of the Meteora DEX. Boosted Community Trust Demonstrates Meteora‚Äôs commitment to its community and fosters a more trustworthy and reliable platform, encouraging greater participation and engagement. Sustainable Ecosystem Growth Contributes to the long-term sustainability of the Meteora ecosystem by protecting it from potential exploits and ensuring a healthy token economy. Industry Leadership Positions Meteora as a leader in responsible DeFi practices, setting a positive example for other projects to follow in prioritizing fairness and security. By implementing this blacklist, Meteora is not only addressing immediate concerns but also laying the foundation for a more robust, trustworthy, and sustainable DeFi platform on Solana. Challenges and Considerations: Navigating the Nuances of Blacklisting While the benefits of a blacklist are clear, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge the potential challenges and considerations that come with implementing such a system. Navigating these nuances effectively is crucial for ensuring the blacklist remains a positive force within the Meteora ecosystem. Risk of False Positives: There‚Äôs always a risk of mistakenly blacklisting legitimate users. Robust due diligence processes and mechanisms for appeal are essential to mitigate this risk. Centralization Concerns: Blacklists, by their nature, involve a degree of centralization. It‚Äôs important for Meteora to maintain transparency and community involvement in the process to avoid perceptions of undue control. Evolving Evasion Tactics: Malicious actors are constantly developing new tactics to evade security measures. The blacklist system will need to be continuously monitored and updated to remain effective against evolving threats. Community Education: Clear communication and education are vital to ensure the community understands the purpose and operation of the blacklist, fostering buy-in and minimizing misunderstandings. Meteora‚Äôs commitment to transparency and community involvement will be key to effectively addressing these challenges and ensuring the blacklist serves its intended purpose without unintended negative consequences. Actionable Insights: Participating in a Fairer DeFi Future Meteora‚Äôs initiative provides valuable insights and actionable steps for both users and the broader DeFi community: For Meteora Users: Actively participate in the community by reporting any suspicious wallet addresses you observe. Your contribution can help maintain the integrity of the MET token distribution and strengthen the ecosystem. For DeFi Projects: Consider implementing similar mechanisms to address fairness and security concerns within your own platforms. Transparency, community involvement, and collaboration with security experts are crucial elements. For the Web3 Community: Support projects like Meteora that prioritize fairness and security. Engage in constructive dialogue and contribute to shaping a more responsible and trustworthy DeFi landscape. By working together, we can build a DeFi ecosystem that is not only innovative and accessible but also fundamentally fair and secure for all participants. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards Trust and Equity in DeFi Meteora‚Äôs introduction of a blacklist for MET token distribution is a revolutionary move that underscores the project‚Äôs commitment to Web3 community trust , crypto fairness , and decentralized exchange security . By proactively addressing concerns about malicious actors and embracing transparency and community participation, Meteora is setting a powerful example for the entire DeFi space. This initiative is not just about protecting MET token distribution; it‚Äôs about building a more equitable, secure, and sustainable future for decentralized finance on Solana and beyond. As the DeFi landscape continues to evolve, such proactive and community-centric approaches will be essential for fostering trust and driving the widespread adoption of decentralized technologies. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Expert Analyst Predicts Bitcoin Price ATH and Altcoin Season Start Dates
body: Cryptocurrency analyst Joao Wedson made important assessments regarding the short-term outlook of Bitcoin in his latest statement. Wedson stated that the Risk Cap metric signals a short-term decline in line with current data, but that important developments may occur in the coming months. The Risk Cap metric measures the risk level of an asset by analyzing the relationship between its market value (market cap) and capital change (delta cap). Normalized into 24-hour periods, this indicator provides important data on Bitcoin's price volatility and risk levels. The Risk Cap metric peaked in March 2024. A lower peak was formed in December, indicating a loss of momentum in market value. Wedson reiterated that he is bearish for Bitcoin in the short term, predicting that altcoin season is approaching but will gain momentum towards the end of April. Related News: Critical SEC Cryptocurrency Meeting Ends - Here's What Was Discussed and the Outcome The analyst emphasized that even if Bitcoin declines, its overall upward trend could continue: The bull market could continue, although a pullback to $64,000 is possible. (A similar situation occurred in 2021.) Stating that he sold Bitcoin in the range of $102,000 ‚Äì $106,000, Wedson stated that the general upward trend could continue despite the current weakness. According to Wedson, Bitcoin could reach a new all-time high by October 2025. However, the real movement is expected to be on the altcoin side. The analyst thinks that smaller and newly launched projects in particular can come to the forefront in the market by drawing liquidity from older projects. Stating that this cycle could last until November-December 2025, Wedson says investors should turn their attention to the altcoin market. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Expert Analyst Predicts Bitcoin Price ATH and Altcoin Season Start Dates

title: Iggy Azalea Made More Crypto Millionaires Than Donald Trump, Tweets Blockchain Creator
body: Iggy Azalea, the American pop and hip-hop singer originally from Australia, has stepped away from her OnlyFans gig. In an interview on "Unchained" with crypto analyst Laura Shin, she expressed her belief that she could create a more positive impact in the world through digital currency. This led her to launch the $MOTHER memecoin on the Solana Blockchain. Although the token hasn‚Äôt garnered much attention in 2025, Nollars Network blockchain creator Richart Dedekind praised the Grammy-nominated artist Friday, noting that her efforts have made crypto investors of her initial coin offering wealthier than President Donald Trump‚Äôs token; a noteworthy feat. In 2 tweets, the $NOLA token creator spoke on Iggy‚Äôs success. ‚ÄúIggy Azaela #MotherToken went to 20 cents from $.001 because guys who wanted to see her booty on OnlyFans. That's a Big Azz Gain, nobody noticed! #PunIntended,‚Äù he wrote in a tweet on Friday. In a follow up tweet on the memecoin he wrote, ‚ÄúIggy made bigger gains for crypto investors than #TrumpToken possibly. And she didn't gas up anything. And she definitely looks like she could produce a lot if needed.‚Äù While injecting humor into the posts, the core message of the tweets remains strong. How Iggy Azalea Memecoin Made More Crypto Millionaires Than POTUS Donld Trump‚Äôs Token In May 2024, renowned rapper Iggy Azalea made a significant splash in the cryptocurrency world by launching her official memecoin, known as the $MOTHER token. Initially, the token was slated for a presale before being listed on centralized exchanges (CEXs). However, in a surprising turn of events, the highly anticipated cryptocurrency bypassed the presale stage and was launched directly on various exchanges. The initial coin offering (ICO) was set at an enticing price point of $0.0001, which quickly drew attention from both fans and investors eager to capitalize on the buzz surrounding Azalea‚Äôs entry into the crypto space. Following its listing, the $MOTHER token experienced an extraordinary surge in value over the next week. The price rose rapidly, jumping from $0.0001 to $0.03 within a few days, and then continuing to gain momentum as it climbed to $0.07, $0.09, and eventually peaking at an impressive $0.11. By June 6th, just weeks after its launch, the $MOTHER token reached a remarkable all-time high of $0.20. This astonishing growth not only showcased the token's potential but also reflected the massive interest generated by Iggy Azalea's brand and the powers of memecoins in the ever-evolving cryptocurrency market. The launch of $MOTHER illustrated the unique dynamics of celebrity-driven cryptocurrencies and their ability to captivate both die-hard fans and savvy investors alike. The growth of $0.0001 to 20 cents was a goliath ROI yield of +20,000% [per crypto calculator ]. Return on Investments: Iggy‚Äôs Memecoin vs Gold [AU] To put things into perspective, investors of the precious metal Gold haven‚Äôt seen annual ROI yields of just 10.6% per year since 1971. In 50 years, this store of value asset hasn‚Äôt seen the return on investment that the $MOTHER token did in a few weeks. A $100 investment in gold in 1971 would be worth around $560 today. A $100 investment in $MOTHER in June 2024, would have been worth $20,000. vs the POTUS Trump Token The daring jump in value even Trump's US President Donald Trump‚Äôs memecoin. The $TRUMP token went from an initial coin offering of $8.50 on public exchanges on January 18th [2025] to an all-time high of $72.68 within 24 hours before facing correction. Though Trump‚Äôs token did well with a near 10x increase in value at its peak, the maximum ROI on initial investments was slightly over +755%. A $100 investment would have yielded profits of $545.53 and a total return of just under $618. And while Official Trump ($TRUMP) and precious Gold [AU] gains are healthy sums compared to most investments, Iggy Azalea‚Äôs coin saw incredibly higher ROI yields than Trump $MOTHER reached a market cap of nearly US$90 million dollars at its peak in June of 2024 and even today, is still worth 4x more than its initial coin listing price. Nollars Network, A Disruptive New Blockchain for Memecoin Trades Therefore, by all accounts, the Nollars Network IES layer-2 blockchain and token‚Äôs creator is valid by all accounts with his controversial statement. And while the crypto-innovators' own project is going through its token presale phase to generate $2 million dollars for the Ineffable Exchange System mainnet, it shows the cryptocurrency inventor is studying the market and its irregularities. The Blockchain innovator is having a bit of fun acknowledging such critical facts about crypto investing and trading. Perhaps he‚Äôs doing this as well to highlight his own project, Nollars Netowrk, which is a disruptor in the memecoin trading market. Kanye West, Iggy Azalea, and Donald Trump‚Äôs tokens will all be traded on the coming hyper-speed layer-2 blockchain via its decentralized exchange, ‚ÄúNoladex.‚Äù However, they will all be traded at faster speeds, allowing better spot prices for investors and also saving money with lower transaction fees. This is just one of the dAPPS expected for the coming Nollars Network ecosystem. The $NOLA token, which is now in presale at 50 cents, is expected to surge in value due to its usefulness for such celebrity-tied markets. The layer-2 project could also become directly useful for Dogecoin (DOGE), as the Dedekind‚Äôs current developers have announced they will push to make the Nollars Network useful for thee ‚ÄúX Money‚Äù payment system for X (formerly Twitter), per Binance News . Though some traditional investors, cryptocurrency and DeFi enthusiasts may not be big on the idea of celebrity memecoins ‚Äî big time money is being made by those who ignore emotions and focus on the profits. Anyone from that group of doubters who went against the grain and bought $5000 or more of Iggy Azalea‚Äôs Mother token at its initial coin offering price would now be a crypto millionaire. Dismissing fake Iggy Azalea Coins & Counterfeit Projects Some may confuse the singer's official coin with scam or leech-brands, created by rug pull artists. For example, one token with the symbol $IGGY was launched by crypto promoter Sahil Arora. The scam artist ran off with $380,000 in presale funds, but the ICO was not related to Iggy Azalea. Simply put, those who bought the IGGY token did not do enough due diligence.There‚Äôs also been other dubious brands by scam artists such as ‚ÄúMother Iggy,‚Äù which has no relation to the grammy-nominated singer either. Projects like Nollars Network (NOLA), Iggy Azalea (MOTHER), and Official POTUS Trump (TRUMP) were all duplicated by scandalous scamsters of the dark web but simply reading a few news articles could allow anyone interested in investing find the official websites. Nonetheless, many still fall victims to their own laze and miss these top crypto investment opportunities. Kanye West Memecoin Prediction While the Nollars Network token presale (via Nollars.com) is highly touted as a long-term hold in the crypto market itself, the creator Richard Dedekind has acknowledged one other celebrity recently that could make a major impact on investor gains. The German mathematician says Kanye West‚Äôs Yeezy token will be a much bigger ROI yield than Bitcoin in 2025 if officially launched. Based on the accuracy of the crypt innovators‚Äô other tweets, perhaps investors should take heed.However, do be aware, the official Ye memecoin will be announced via Yeezy.com and the rapper himself. Do not fall for cryptocurrency brands unverified by West himself. Also check lists of the top token presales of 2025 for notifications of an ICO launch. title: Across Protocol (ACX) soars 40% on Bithumb listing: Is Bitcoin Pepe set for more gains?
body: Across Protocol (ACX) price has surged over 40%, driven by positive news related to South Korea crypto exchange Bithumb. Meanwhile, Bitcoin Pepe (BPEP) is gaining traction as it nears $5.7 million in presale funds raised so far. With the broader market conditions having an impact on Bitcoin price and altcoins, what is the price prediction for ACX and could Bitcoin Pepe be a greater opportunity? Across Protocol (ACX) rallies 40% In hitting $0.44, Across Protocol showed a massive upside flip, having hovered near $0.32 in early action on March 22. As noted above, the catalyst for ACX price looks to have been the announcement from Bithumb, South Korea‚Äôs second-largest crypto exchange. The exchange announced the listing of Across Protocol with a Korean Won (KRW) trading pair. With Bithumb‚Äôs large user base and high trading volume key, ACX could get notable visibility and liquidity. Bulls have given up some of the gains as prices currently fluctuate near the previous resistance line. But what is the technical outlook? ACX price prediction A look at Across Protocol price on the daily chart shows key indicators slightly in favour of bulls. The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) line has crossed above the signal line to signal bullish momentum. Across Protocol chart by TradingView Meanwhile, the Relative Strength Index (RSI), a measure of price momentum, is upslopping and above the midpoint. However, the 40% spike has the RSI above 70 to indicate overbought conditions. The indicator thus suggests a potential reversal as traders potentially move to lock in latest gains. Support above $0.38 will see buyers target $0.46 and $0.64 range before $1 comes into view. On the other hand, profit taking may see buyers try to defend $0.32. Bitcoin Pepe (BPEP) gains presale momentum While ACX listing on Bithumb adds to excitement for the project‚Äôs community, fresh enthusiasm is also driving a bullish set up for Bitcoin Pepe (BPEP). The project, the world‚Äôs first meme ICO on Bitcoin, has raised nearly $5.7 million as the presale continues to gather pace. Bitcoin Pepe aims to integrate Solana‚Äôs high-speed blockchain features into Bitcoin, providing a layer 2 network that will drive meme evolution on the flagship blockchain network. Currently priced at $0.0281 in stage 7 of 30, BPEP price will rise 5% in each of the remaining presale stages. Early buyers could see a steady price appreciation ahead of market debut. This appears to be the case as investors position . Notably, BPEP‚Äôs market potential is down to its post-presale outlook. The broader crypto performance will also be a crucial factor. title: Expert at First SEC Crypto Roundtable: Bitcoin Neither Security Nor Investment
body: Expert Lee Reiners says Bitcoin isn‚Äôt a security or investment contract Reiners highlights multiple dimensions of decentralization in digital assets True decentralization assessed across a spectrum of parameters; Bitcoin truly fits Lee Reiners, a visiting fellow at the Duke Financial Economics Center, defined Bitcoin based on its level of decentralization during the first-ever US SEC Crypto Task Force roundtable . The financial expert stated that Bitcoin is neither a security nor an investment contract. LEE REINERS: "BITCOIN IS NOT A SECURITY, IT'S NOT AN INVESTMENT CONTRACT, BECAUSE IT IS SUFFICIENTLY DECENTRALIZED" https://t.co/vve5faEvlB pic.twitter.com/Dqc580OVwf ‚Äî The Wolf Of All Streets (@scottmelker) March 22, 2025 What Makes Bitcoin Unique in Terms of Decentralization? According to Reiners, despite Bitcoin‚Äôs widely acknowledged extent of decentralization, it remains impossible to determine when a digital asset is ‚Äúsufficiently decentralized.‚Äù Referencing a CFTC report from last year, Reiners noted that digital assets decentralization exists across a spectrum of parameters, including governance, asset, user, application, data, network, ‚Ä¶ The post Expert at First SEC Crypto Roundtable: Bitcoin Neither Security Nor Investment appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Coinbase inks sponsorship with Australian rugby club Cronulla Sharks
body: Coinbase has inked a sponsorship deal with Australian sporting outfit Cronulla Sharks. According to the announcement, the National Rugby League (NRL) club said the cryptocurrency exchange will have its insignia at the front of its players‚Äô shorts for the 2025 season. Coinbase has joined other crypto companies that have inked sponsorship deals with sporting outfits, amid a quest to bring in more people into the sector. The platform launched in Australia in 2021, offering Australians access to alternative economies and a pathway to engage with digital assets. Coinbase set to partner with Cronulla Sharks in 2025 NRL season In the statement by the Country Director Coinbase Australia, John O‚ÄôLoghlen, both parties are excited about the partnership as the 2025 season commences. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre extremely excited to announce our partnership with the Cronulla Sharks for the upcoming 2025 season,‚Äù O‚ÄôLoghlen said. He also mentioned that teaming up with the rugby team will ensure a better way to connect with its users in the country while opening spaces for new users. ‚ÄúCoinbase is the world‚Äôs most trusted crypto exchange and as we expand our footprint within Australia, partnering with a team like the Sharks brings a unique way for us to connect with users,‚Äù he said. O‚ÄôLoghlen added that crypto has been mainstream in Australia, noting that about six million current holders of several digital assets in the country. ‚ÄúCrypto has become a mainstream asset option in Australia, with almost six million Australians owning crypto and growing support from global political and industry figures. We‚Äôre extremely excited to be joining forces with the Sharks in what‚Äôs shaping up to be a huge 2025 season and look forward to bringing the Coinbase brand to one of the most active and engaged fanbases in the NRL,‚Äù he added. Crypto firms continue to push for adoption in sports Sharks Group CEO Dino Mezzatesta also mentioned how excited the group is to partner with Coinbase, noting the reputation of the firm. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs tremendously exciting for the Sharks to join forces with an international brand like Coinbase, one of the world‚Äôs most recognizable and secure cryptocurrency platforms,‚Äù he said. The Sharks are pleased to announce a partnership with a leading international cryptocurrency exchange, @Coinbase_AU , as the club's new front-of-shorts NRL sponsor ü§ù https://t.co/U39EuL4vRb ‚Äî Cronulla Sharks (@cronullasharks) March 22, 2025 He also added that they both share the same vision, noting the team‚Äôs quest for success in the upcoming 2025 NRL season. ‚ÄúOur organizations are similar in that innovation is at the forefront of our thinking. We‚Äôre delighted to enter a fruitful partnership and have Coinbase proudly featured on our shorts as we aim to break new ground in pursuit of the 2025 NRL title,‚Äù Mezzatesta added. According to a Financial Times report in February, crypto firms sponsoring sporting brands, leagues, and players have been on the rise this year. The report quoted research carried out by marketing agency Sport quake, which mentioned that 22 deals have been struck between crypto firms and sporting brands this year, with an average value of $4.3 million. The report highlighted that it was an improvement from last year where 18 deals were struck for an average of $2.6 million. One of the notable partnerships includes Tether‚Äôs purchase of a minority stake in Italian football club Juventus, with the deal valued at around $50 million. ‚ÄúAligned with our strategic investment in Juve, Tether will be a pioneer in merging new technologies, such as digital assets, AI, and biotech, with the well-established sports industry to drive change globally,‚Äù Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino said in his statement. Other deals include Coinbase‚Äôs partnership with Formula One racing team Aston Martin Aramco, Gate.io‚Äôs deal with Oracle Red Bull Racing, XBO.com‚Äôs partnership with the Argentina national team, Sportsbet.io‚Äôs deal with Snooker‚Äôs Players Championship, and a deal between Cloudbet and mixed martial arts organization Professional Fighters League. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Best Crypto to Buy Now As Michael Saylor Set to Raise Funds to Buy Bitcoin
body: MicroStrategy‚Äôs founder and ardent Bitcoin believer Michael Saylor recently announced his plans to raise over $711 million to buy more Bitcoin via the sale of a new series of preferred stock. His purchases have only risen over the years, with the company now holding close to half a million Bitcoins ; this purchase could potentially help MSTR own more than 500k Bitcoins. If such a huge transaction goes through, then it is quite likely that the overall market will, though slow and steady, see an uptrend in prices. Some of the best cryptos to buy to enjoy excellent ROIs at the time are listed below. Best Crypto to Buy Now - Top Altcoins That May Pump Soon BTC Bull ‚Äì BTCBULL When Bitcoin inches toward another major rally, history shows that the ripple effect reaches far beyond the original coin. BTC Bull is one of those projects eyeing the early wave‚Äînot by copying BTC, but by celebrating it, amplifying it, and turning it into a high-engagement meme economy. At first glance, it might seem like just another meme token with a bullish theme. But there‚Äôs more happening under the hood. BTC Bull is designed around community-triggered milestones‚Äîas the project hits growth targets, it unlocks airdrops for holders. This kind of reward-based system gives people a reason to hold, not just speculate. On top of that, it‚Äôs got a burn mechanism baked in, meaning the total token supply reduces over time, applying consistent upward pressure on price as demand grows. The fact that it has already raised nearly $4 million says a lot. There‚Äôs attention, there‚Äôs energy, and‚Äîimportantly‚Äîthere‚Äôs capital already backing the project.
